item.title: The Lord Blesses His Children through Patriarchal Blessings
item.description:
The Lord Blesses His Children through Patriarchal Blessings by Elder Richard D. Allred, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 167th Semiannual General Conference on Tue Sep 30 1997
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Richard D. Allred, Of the Seventy
